# TickCallback delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool TickCallback(IntPtr widget, IntPtr frame_clock, IntPtr user_data);
```

| --- | --- |
| widget | Transfer ownership: none |
| frame_clock | Transfer ownership: none |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |
